display_long_description:
Jingle Strike — VR Bowling combines true-to-life bowling physics with absurd holiday chaos. Every throw feels solid and satisfying, and the workshop elves never stop reacting—cheering, jeering, roasting you, or sometimes… farting. Miss a shot and you’ll hear about it. Nail a strike and they’ll lose their minds.

Bowl across four fully themed festive lanes filled with lights, snow, toys, and mischievous characters. Prefer something non-Christmas? Jump into 85 Second Slam-Down, a fast arcade mode with music, lights, and pure bowling mayhem.

Take a break between frames at the complimenting soda machine, toss gifts or snowballs at the elves to trigger new reactions, or chase leaderboard glory. It’s light, cheerful, and endlessly replayable.

Play solo or pass the headset for up-to-five-player couch VR—perfect for gatherings, parties, or quick laughs.

FEATURES
🎳 Real-Physics VR Bowling – every roll feels natural & weighty
🎄 Four Festive Lanes – from Workshop to Candy Cane Lane
🔥 85 Second Slam-Down – fast arcade bowling with no holiday décor
🥤 Complimenting Soda Machine – grab a drink & a compliment
🎁 Throwables & Reactions – snowballs, gifts, pins & more
🏆 Leaderboards – compete with friends & the world
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Solo or 5-Player Couch VR – pass-and-play fun for all

Light-hearted, silly, and endlessly replayable—this is bowling season, elf-style.
